name: deg1xrcl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cxr))
-| wf(c2, c1, cxr)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cxr))
-| wf(c2, c1, cxr)

body.origin:
|- wf(c2, c1, cxr)
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cdg1, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cpl1, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), cxr))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cdg1, c3))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(cpl1, c3))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c4))

comment: Closure of univariate polynomial degree in extended reals. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Mar-2015.)
